Dr. Kurian is an awesome badass Dr. Who tells you what you need to hear and is a phenomenal surgeon. I‚Äôve been seeing her for 2.5 years and am down 120 pounds from my highest weight.

I highly recommend her and she has a fantastic front desk staff that work hard to make sure you‚Äôre covered and taken care of. If you are looking to go to the best place for bariatric surgery, this is it. Hands down.

originalText.text: Dr. Kurian is a very rare find - my journey with her has been a life-changing and joyful experience. She took me through my sleeve surgery several years ago and this year helped me get to a new goal using a GLP medication. The results have exceeded any of my expectations. She is patient, thoughtful, thorough, empowering and kind. Everyone in her office is extremely competent, helpful and responsive.

originalText.text: Dr. Kurian is a wonderful person and surgeon. Aside from being beautiful and brilliant, she is extremely kind, caring and patient. I had 2 successful procedures by her, one in 2009 and 2023. Her staff also really goes above and beyond and are super efficient. There's never a wait to get them on the phone, get an appt or even to see the doctor. My Experience Overall 10/10.

originalText.text: ABOVE AND BEYOND!! I went see Dr. Kurian for a routine hernia repair, but was very nervous as it was my first experience with major surgery. Not only did she make herself available for last minute changes to my schedule but she put me at ease right away with her professionalism and level of experience. The surgery could not have gone smoother and I would recommend her to anyone for general surgery or to pursue something in her area of expertise. She is the best!

originalText.text: Easily 10 ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê!  Dr. Marina S. Kurian is an exceptional professional.  Two years ago she performed surgery on me.  She was accessible, comforting, reassuring, accommodating, funny, incredibly knowledgeable, and never condescending or dismissive of my concerns or questions that certain YouTube videos moved me to ask her.  I'm so glad that my primary doctor recommended her to me.  He told me she was the best and I wholeheartedly agree.  Her surgical team is also top of the line!  She also has an amazing, professional, and wonderful supporting staff at her Manhattan location.  Thank you all!  Thank you Dr. Kurian!  üôÇ
